name: Itchioware
description:
In this game made by a team of current game design students at Fitchburg State University, you must quickly adapt to new micro-games as they appear, and solve them in order to complete the game.

Credits:

Tariq Thomas - Team Lead, 2D Artist 

David Wu - Programmer, Source Control, UI implementer

David Eisenberg - Programmer Systems Design 

Robert Tien Minshull - 2D Artist 

Casey Taylor - 2D Artist 

Max Campbell - 2D Artist 

Matthew Carey - Sound Design
